name: equsexhv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

|- wb(wex(s0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ equsexh with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)
